source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_00<tab>Giott...<var 1A 02 /var>isn't drinking<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_00<tab>Giott est perdu dans ses pensées, et plus inquiétant, à jeun.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_01<tab>You snap Giott from a melancholy reverie, prompting the dwarf to remember that Sophrosyne recently paid visit to Tomra and may still be in the area. Giott theorizes, based upon your recent vision, that the Virtue reflexively heals those sin eaters it recognizes as helmless dwarves─those of Lamitt's people who joined her in exile─and concludes that adding a helm to any eaters you would prefer remain dead may be enough to deter it from doing so. Though this seems almost too easy, it is true that sin eaters are simple beings, with no real powers of cognition that might allow them to see through even rudimentary deception. In any case, there is only one way to find out.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_01<tab>Sophrosyne est apparue dans le village nain pendant que vous n'étiez pas là et a ranimé le purgateur que Giott avait abattu à l'entrée de la galerie des Condamnés. Cet événement a suffi à convaincre votre partenaire de tenir là une piste. Giott suppose en effet que Sophrosyne ranime exclusivement les êtres humains qu'a autrefois sauvés Lamitt de la gangrène des Duergars, même s'ils ont été transformés en purgateur. De plus, il semble convaincu que coiffer ces purgateurs mineurs et Sophrosyne d'un casque nain suffira à résoudre le problème. Afin de tester cette théorie, vous devez maintenant abattre les purgateurs qui errent sur le plateau aux Rocs afin d'appâter Sophrosyne.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_02<tab>You locate a pair of sin eaters, and summarily put them down as potential bait for Sophrosyne. As you well know by now, however, littering the entire area with corpses would be more likely to attract the Virtue's attention─and also somewhat cathartic.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_02<tab>Des purgateurs errants rôdent encore sur le plateau aux Rocs. Allez les abattre.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_03<tab>Now that you have dispatched a multitude of sin eaters and given Giott ample time to do the same, the time has come to reunite. Hopefully the dwarf has been able to keep at least one kill reasonably intact.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez abattu tous les purgateurs errants de la zone. Retrouvez Giott.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_04<tab>As hoped, Sophrosyne appears to revive one of the sin eaters you left as lure. Upon engaging the newly risen eater in battle, Giott instructs you to use your spellcraft to put the thing to sleep, and unceremoniously crams its head into a helmet once you do. This does, in fact, prevent Sophrosyne from automatically healing the eater, and thankfully proceeds to work several more times as additional lesser eaters make themselves known. When, at last, all that remains is to defeat the Virtue itself, Giott raises the sole remaining spare helm brought for this purpose with a triumphant shout─and is promptly hurled backward by a sorcerous blow, the helm blasted to smithereens. With no other choice, she brazenly removes her own helm, revealing her face for the first time. Crowned with the helm of your courageous comrade, Sophrosyne is finally vulnerable, and the pair of you destroy it as one.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_04<tab>La méthode éprouvée de Giott pour attirer Sophrosyne a une fois de plus fonctionné, et vous avez réussi à vaincre le purgateur et sa cohorte. Assistez aux derniers instants de Sophrosyne.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_05<tab>Sophrosyne leaves behind a damaged crystal, one which you recognize immediately. As you pick it up, it resonates, calling forth a manifestation of Lamitt's memories. Giott calls out to her, though she is long beyond hearing, desperate to assure her that her legacy is not forgotten. And while the real Lamitt may not have known that, someday, one amongst her kin would at last recognize her for the noble woman she had been, her shade's words make clear that she was, at least, at peace with her sacrifice in the end.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_05<tab>Le spectre de Lamitt est apparu au moment où vous avez ramassé le cristal de Lumière que détenait Sophrosyne. La soigneuse naine a partagé ses souvenirs alors que sa conscience s'évaporait pour de bon, et Giott semble lui avoir pardonné. Parlez à Giott pour connaître son sentiment.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_06<tab>You speak to Giott, who confirms what you suspected─having broken her people's taboo by taking off her helm, she no longer feels as if she can return to Tomra. Having seen how inflexible dwarven traditions can be, and knowing how much they mean to Giott, you know it is not your place to disagree, and so follow her to the Crystarium instead.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_06<tab>Giott a mené à bien la mission qu'<var 1A 02 /var>elle<var 1A 01 /var> s'était fixée. Pour ce faire cependant, il lui a fallu retirer son casque en votre présence, ce qui constitue une entorse aux règles naines. Elle a donc décidé de quitter son village et de vivre en exil, comme Lamitt le fit autrefois. Retrouvez-la aux Marches nébuleuses, à Cristarium.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_07<tab>When you join Giott at the Wandering Stairs, she appears to be faring better than one might have expected, given the circumstances, and is certainly cheered for your presence. She tells you that while she still values tradition, leaving her village has given her an appreciation for the wider world and all that is precious in it─an appreciation that Lamitt, too, once shared. As you trade fond farewells, it is clear that, much like the woman she has come to admire, she will bear her burdens without breaking under their weight.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_07<tab>Giott a retrouvé du poil de la bête, et c'est en compagnie d'une chopine que vous l'avez retrouvée aux Marches nébuleuses. La Naine vous a révélé pourquoi elle fut si choquée d'apprendre la vérité au sujet de Lamitt<var 1D /var>; le doyen ayant autrefois banni la soigneuse naine était en effet l'arrière-grand-père de votre partenaire. Au soir de cette aventure, Giott a certes dû, ou plutôt décidé de couper les ponts avec son village natal, mais son voyage lui a permis de converser avec diverses gens, de vous rencontrer, et surtout, l'a rendu plus altruiste. Votre amie est maintenant une fière exilée, et elle répondra toujours présente lorsque vous voudrez prendre un verre avec elle.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_001<tab>Oh. Hello there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_001<tab>Ah... Salut, toi...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_Q1_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A1_000_001<tab>Lali-ho!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A1_000_001<tab>Lali-ho<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A1_000_002<tab>Hey, you hammer-brained imbecile! Your mother was a hobgoblin!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A1_000_002<tab>Bah alors, ta mère la hobgobeline t'a privé de boisson<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_003<tab>Wha─ I mean, lali-ho!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_003<tab>HMM<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_004<tab>Oh! And a lali-ho to you!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_004<tab>La... Lali-ho<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_100_004<tab>I'm impressed. You knowing to give me a “lali-ho” just now shows that you've really picked up on the finer points of dwarven culture.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_100_004<tab>J'ai honte<var 1D /var>! Il a fallu que ce soit toi qui m'rappelles les bonnes manières<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_005<tab>Some of that may be accurate, but my mother most definitely was <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> a hobgoblin! Are you sure you ain't getting her confused with your own mother?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_005<tab>N-n-n-non mais<var 1D /var>! Ça va pas d'insulter la maman de quelqu'un d'autre<var 1D /var>!? <var 09 E948 ((<var 08 E905 ((Crétine)) ((Crétin)) /var> d'Hume<var 1D /var>!)) ((Grande asperge d'Elfe<var 1D /var>!)) ((Pauvre <var 08 E905 ((Naine)) ((Nain)) /var> sans honte<var 1D /var>!)) ((Sac à puces<var 1D /var>!)) ((Pauvre mastard<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>!)) ((Tête d'écailles<var 1D /var>!)) ((T'as rien trouvé de mieux pour te rendre utile, Ronso de pacotille<var 1D /var>!?)) ((Va gambader ailleurs, <var 08 E905 ((la Viis)) ((le Viis)) /var><var 1D /var>!)) /var>

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_006<tab>Ha! Hammer-brained!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_006<tab>Pff... Pffff... Pwah ah ah ah ah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_100_006<tab>I never thought I'd see the day when you took to friendly insults, partner!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_100_006<tab>Bien joué, part'naire<var 1D /var>! Ta provocation m'a donné le coup de fouet dont j'avais besoin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_007<tab>That really helped, thanks! I was so busy dwelling on that business with Lamitt that I almost forgot the news I had for you about Sophrosyne.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_007<tab>Allez, c'est pas l'tout, mais on doit régler son compte à Sophrosyne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_008<tab>You remember that sin eater I killed in the Blightwarrens? Well, while you were gone, Sophrosyne showed up to revive it.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_008<tab>Figure-toi qu'un peu avant que t'arrives, elle est apparue dans le village et a causé une panique pas possible. Tout ça pour ranimer le purgateur que j'avais vaincu à l'entrée de la galerie et repartir ensemble après.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_009<tab>Seeing that convinced me...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_009<tab>C'est là que j'ai reçu l'illumination...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_010<tab>I mean, you remember how I was wondering why Sophrosyne don't revive every sin eater we take down, right?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_010<tab>Les purgateurs, c'est pas c'qui manque, mais Sophrosyne ne les soigne pas tous. Comment ça se fait<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_011<tab>Well, we learned from your vision that the dwarves that Lamitt cured of stoneblight went into exile of their own volition.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_011<tab>Tu te souviens des Nains que Lamitt a guéris<var 1D /var>? Ceux qui se sont exilés de leur prop'e volonté en réponse au bannissement de leur sauveuse<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_012<tab>As you can see, the village was spared the worst of the Flood. But the folks that left, well...probably weren't. Which means...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_012<tab>Le village a échappé au déluge de Lumière, mais j'mettrais ma barbe à couper qu'eux n'ont pas eu cette chance. Tu vois où je veux en venir<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_Q2_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A2_000_001<tab>They became sin eaters.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A2_000_001<tab>Les villageois sauvés par Lamitt sont devenus des purgateurs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A2_000_002<tab>Sophrosyne is healing the same people Lamitt did!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A2_000_002<tab>Sophrosyne continue de soigner les villageois qu'a sauvés Lamitt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_014<tab>Right─it's the only thing that makes sense. Those poor souls couldn't go back to the village, so they got caught in the Flood. They became sin eaters. And Sophrosyne is still saving them. Even now.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_014<tab>Exactement<var 1D /var>! Ces malheureux ont été transformés en purgateur après avoir quitté le village. Sophrosyne n'a pas cessé de s'occuper d'eux durant tout ce temps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_015<tab>...And that gave me an idea! As we figured before, Sophrosyne ain't alive. But Lamitt wanted so badly to heal those dwarves that it's still following suit─like a reflex its body can't forget.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_015<tab>Si j'ai vu juste, l'abatt'e sera un jeu d'enfant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_016<tab>The last time Lamitt saw those folks she healed, they were helmless, leaving their home for the last time. She probably never forgot the sight of them. And so Sophrosyne goes around healing helmless dwarves to this day. You see the solution, right? Helms!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_016<tab>Sophrosyne ne soigne que ceux qui comme Lamitt ont brisé l'interdit. Si on leur visse à tous un casque nain su' la tête, elle ne les reconnaîtra plus comme tels et cessera de les ranimer en boucle, elle comprise<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_Q3_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A3_000_001<tab>Incredible! That's the stupidest thing I've ever heard!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A3_000_001<tab>Tu t'avances beaucoup, quand même<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A3_000_002<tab>So simple...it's brilliant!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A3_000_002<tab>Un plan à toute épreuve<var 1D /var>! Bravo, Giott<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_018<tab>It sounds too simple, I know. But it'll work, I tell you! Sophrosyne is healing helmless dwarves on pure instinct. Anyone wearing a helm, it won't think twice about─seeing as it don't actually think at all.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_018<tab>Mon plan t'plaît pas<var 1D /var>!? Il est pourtant parfait<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_019<tab>Isn't it just? Not as brilliant as my beard, maybe, but few things are.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_019<tab>Pwah ah ah ah ah<var 1D /var>! Que veux-tu, mon esprit est aussi aiguisé qu'ma barbe est soyeuse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_020<tab>Now, whether clapping a helm onto Sophrosyne will keep it from healing <var 1A 02 /var>itself<var 1A 01 /var>, I can't say. It'll depend on whether the thing sees itself as just another helmless dwarf. It don't seem to have much in the way of self-awareness, so I think it's worth a shot.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_020<tab>Que tu sois pour ou contre ne change rien, cela dit. Personne ne me dissuadera<var 1D /var>! Et si ça se finit en eau de boudin, je déguerpirai fissa pour r'voir ma copie et mieux recommencer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_021<tab>Fortunately, we won't need to wait to find out. It came around not too long before you did, so if we kill the right sort of sin eaters, it should still be close enough to notice. Let's get to it!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_021<tab>Sophrosyne n'a pu aller bien loin, pas en si peu d'temps. Abattons quelques purgateurs errants, comme d'habitude, et elle se montrera bien assez tôt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_025<tab>You go and find some sin eaters─I'll grab a few spare helms.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_025<tab>Que fais-tu, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>? Tu connais la danse maintenant, on fait la chasse aux purgateurs errants chacun de not'e côté<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_150<tab>Right. So we've got our eaters, we've got our helms...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_150<tab>Bien. L'appât est prêt, et j'ai assez de casques nains pour tout un régiment.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_151<tab>And now, we wait. Once Sophrosyne shows up, we'll test out a helm on the bait first─that'll also save us from having to kill it over and over.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_151<tab>Si d'autres purgateurs pointent le bout de leur nez, ils se retrouveront coiffés d'un beau galurin. Comme ça, Sophrosyne ne d'vrait pas les ranimer<var 1D /var>! Cachons-nous en attendant qu'elle daigne se montrer, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_050_151<tab>This feels familiar.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_050_151<tab>(soupire)... L'attente, c'est pas mon fort... J'ai comme le marteau qui me démange...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_100_151<tab>(-Giott-)Aha! At last!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_100_151<tab>(La voilà<var 1D /var>!)

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_200_151<tab>A bit less toppling over on your part, this time, if you please.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_200_151<tab>(L'heure de notre ultime combat a sonné<var 1D /var>! Suis mon plan aux p'tits oignons et tout ira bien, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!)

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Slay Sophrosyne once and for all!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Vainquez Sophrosyne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_000<tab>Wait for it to be distracted with healing the other one. Then we strike.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_000<tab>(Tout d'abord, on va attendre qu'elle ranime ce purgateur<var 1D /var>!)

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>Now! Charge!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>Maintenant, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! À l'assaut<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_002<tab>As I said, we'll try this on the lesser eater first.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_002<tab>On va tester ma théorie sur celui-là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_003<tab>I'll give it a bit of a pummeling, then you put it to sleep with Repose. That'll give me the chance to slip the helm on.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_003<tab>Utilise Sérénité sur lui quand je l'aurai assez affaibli<var 1D /var>! Ça créera une ouverture, et j'en profiterai pour lui visser un casque su' la caboche<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_004<tab>I doubt it'll take to napping mid-battle unless it's nearly ready to drop, so wait for my signal, you hear?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_004<tab>Attends bien que je lui aie mis quelques tartes<var 1D /var>! S'il est trop en forme, Sérénité ne fonctionnera pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_005<tab>It's time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Cast Repose!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_005<tab>Je l'sens un peu plus mollasson. On y est, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Lance Sérénité sur lui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_006<tab>Alright, let's get that ugly mug of yours covered up.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_006<tab>Bravo<var 1D /var>! Et maintenant qu'il fait dodo, c'est l'heure du cadeau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_007<tab>Ha! Ain't that a sight?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_007<tab>Pwah ah ah ah ah<var 1D /var>! Bienvenue chez les Nains, mon petit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_008<tab>Listen, when I said “put it to sleep,” that wasn't a euphemism. If we kill it, Sophrosyne'll keep bringing it back!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_008<tab>Ah, mais non<var 1D /var>! Tout est à refaire<var 1D /var>! N'oublie pas de lancer ton sort Sérénité sur lui une fois que je l'ai affaibli<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_009<tab>Looks like it worked─it's not reviving the thing. Now we─ Uh oh.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_009<tab>Et v'là le travail<var 1D /var>! Au tour de Sophro... Hé, mais...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_010<tab>Lucky for us, I brought extra helms in case of emergency!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_010<tab>Des renforts, hein<var 1D /var>? Manque de chance pour elle, il me reste un paquet de casques nains<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_011<tab>Alright, <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var> we can─ Oh, wicked <var 1A 02 /var>white<var 1A 01 /var> that's annoying.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_011<tab>Ahhh... Ahhh... Ahhh... Et v'là... Ahhh... L'travail... Au tour de... Oh, ben non<var 1D /var>! Pas encore<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_012<tab>Are these ones maybe...trying to protect it? Does some part of them remember?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_012<tab>Bizarre, on dirait qu'ils la protègent.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_013<tab>Well, no time to ponder that now. Helms away!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_013<tab>Pas grave<var 1D /var>! On enchaîne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_014<tab>It looks like they've...<pant>...stopped coming. Now we hit Sophrosyne with everything we've got!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_014<tab>Ahhh... Ahhh... Ils... Ils nous en ont fait perdre du temps... Allez, passons à Sophrosyne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_100<tab>It's time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We can end this.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_100<tab>Allons-y, part'naire. Elle est à nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_101<tab>Looks like I was right─no healing for you! Ha!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_101<tab>Pwah ah ah ah ah<var 1D /var>! Mon plan de génie a fonctionné<var 1D /var>! Elle ne peut plus se soigner<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_102<tab>Oh, right. Lamitt was a big damn hero. No surprise that she knows a few dangerous tricks.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_102<tab>Argh<var 1D /var>! C'était pas une Guerrière de la Lumière pour rien<var 1D /var>! Même sans sa magie curative, elle reste costaude<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_103<tab>Come here! Quickly!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_103<tab>Par ici, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_104<tab>I knew you'd have my back!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_104<tab>C'est pas passé loin<var 1D /var>! Bien joué, part'naire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_105<tab>Here it comes. Try not to die!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_105<tab>Il faut tenir coûte que coûte, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... On y est presque<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_106<tab>You don't scare me! I have a giant hammer!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_106<tab>Va falloir faire mieux que ça, ma petite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_152<tab>Perfect! Now...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_152<tab>C'est le moment<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_153<tab>Hold still!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_153<tab>J'ai un beau couvre-chef pour toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_154<tab>Waugh!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_154<tab>Ahhhhh<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_155<tab>Oof. Thanks.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_155<tab>M... Merci, part'naire...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_156<tab>The helm got it even worse than I did just then. And it was our last one.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_156<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, c'était mon dernier casque...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_157<tab>I hate to say it, but this ain't going as well as I hoped. If we had even one more helm, I could try again, but...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_157<tab>Et la r'voilà au top de sa forme... On n'en finira jamais, pas sans casque...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_158<tab>Wait. We do have one more helm...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_158<tab>Sans casque...<var 1D /var>? Mais si<var 1D /var>! Il nous en reste un<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_159<tab>Just the one!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_159<tab>Cette fois, j'te tiens<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_160<tab>Well, well... Looks like it's time to take this eater down, once and for all. Together!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_160<tab>Et voilà<var 1D /var>! Il nous reste p'us qu'à lui mettre une bonne raclée pour achever le travail<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_161<tab>Ha! Take that, you pasty bastard!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_161<tab>Ouais<var 1D /var>!!! Ah ah ah<var 1D /var>! On lui a fait mord'e la poussière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_162<tab>What's that you've got there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_162<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>? Tu as trouvé quelque chose<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_163<tab>Some kind of crystal?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_163<tab>Qu'est-ce que c'est que c'machin<var 1D /var>? Un fragment de cristal<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_164<tab>(-???-)Tradition wouldn't have saved her. That's why I left.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_164<tab>(-Voix triste-)Je ne pouvais pas les sauver... pas tout en préservant nos traditions...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_165<tab>(-Lamitt's Shade-)I left, and I traveled. I met Ardbert. We found our companions. And together, we searched.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_165<tab>(-Apparition de Lamitt-)Alors, j'ai quitté mon village... et c'est là que j'ai fait la rencontre de mon premier camarade... Ardbert. Notre aventure n'a cessé de se poursuivre... et au gré de nos voyages, d'autres se sont joints à nous.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_166<tab>Are you...her? Lamitt? I... Listen, I called you a disgrace, before, and...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_166<tab>Lamitt<var 1D /var>? C'est bien toi, n'est-ce pas...<var 1D /var>? Tu es la grande pécheresse... celle que j'ai toujours haïe...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_167<tab>(-Lamitt's Shade-)My journey was not an easy one. To save my sister, to save them all, I faced a thousand thousand foes.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_167<tab>(-Apparition de Lamitt-)Je devais sauver ma sœur... et toutes les autres victimes de la gangrène des Duergars. J'ai saigné pour eux, surmonté tous les obstacles... car je le devais, aussi dure que fût la route...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_168<tab>I know! I understand, now! And I'm so...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_168<tab>Je sais, Lamitt... Je connais la vérité, maintenant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_169<tab>(-Lamitt's Shade-)But as I did, I learned. How wide this world is. How beautiful. How cruel. And how much I wanted to protect it.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_169<tab>(-Apparition de Lamitt-)J'ai voyagé aux quatre coins du monde... Je l'ai vu dans toute sa splendeur... et dans toute sa cruauté... Voilà pourquoi j'ai entrepris de le soigner de ses maux...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_170<tab>(-Lamitt's Shade-)Perhaps it should have been easy for me, then. To give up my home forever, for a greater cause. It wasn't. It hurt so much...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_170<tab>(-Apparition de Lamitt-)Mon cœur s'est déchiré le jour où j'ai dû abandonner mon village... Mais je le devais... Je le devais...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_171<tab>But you bore it! You forgave them! You survived...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_171<tab>Lamitt<var 1D /var>! Cesse de t'infliger ça<var 1D /var>! Ton voyage a déjà pris fin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_172<tab>(-Lamitt's Shade-)Yes, it hurt, but I survived. Because they were there. Because <var 1A 02 /var>he<var 1A 01 /var> was there.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_172<tab>(-Apparition de Lamitt-)Malgré mon infortune, j'ai réussi à aller de l'avant... et c'est à lui que je le dois...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_173<tab>(-Lamitt's Shade-)Ardbert, you stubborn idiot. You sweet boy. You never did understand what you meant to me...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_173<tab>(-Apparition de Lamitt-)Ardbert... Il fallait toujours t'aider... mais tu n'abandonnais jamais, au grand jamais. Tu n'étais fait que de douceur... et je...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_174<tab>Rest well, Lamitt. You were the best of us.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_174<tab>Je me souviendrai toujours de toi pour ta compassion, Lamitt. Va, maintenant... Repose en paix, honorable soigneuse...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_200<tab>We did it─I can hardly believe it!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_200<tab>Et voilà... Mission accomplie...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_201<tab>This calls for a drink at the Crystarium, don't you think?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_201<tab>On rentre à Cristarium, part'naire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_202<tab>If that silence is you wondering if I want to go home─well, I can't. I showed my face to you, didn't I? Broke our rules.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_202<tab>Je ne rent'e pas chez moi, non... J'ai brisé l'interdit, j'ai découvert mon visage devant toi, alors que nous n'appartenons pas à la même famille.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_203<tab>So I'm thinking I'll give Lamitt's way a try. Live proud as an exile, just like all the other folks that she saved.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_203<tab>Ça ne fait rien. Même en exil, j'ai b'en l'intention de tracer ma route la tête haute, comme ces gens que Lamitt a sauvés autrefois.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_204<tab>Aw, don't make that face. It's nothing that a little ale won't solve!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_204<tab>Haut les cœurs, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Cristarium et ses délices liquides nous attendent<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_250<tab><gulp> <gulp> <gulp> Ahhh. That's the stuff!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_250<tab>Gloup-gloup-gloup-gloup... Peuhaaaaa<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_251<tab>Er, can I help you? You're staring─<var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> staring. Do you know you're doing that?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_251<tab>Eh b'en, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>? C'est ma descente qui te laisse baba<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_Q4_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A4_000_001<tab>Exactly how much have you had to drink?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A4_000_001<tab>On ne perd pas les bonnes habitudes à ce que je vois.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A4_000_002<tab>I'm glad that you're here. Helm or no.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A4_000_002<tab>Désolé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, j'étais émerveillé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> devant ton joli minois.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_253<tab>Well, I lost count─so about as much as usual. Ha! I may be an exile, but I'm still a dwarf. And don't you forget it!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_253<tab>Je suis peut-être exilée, mais je reste une Naine du bout des cheveux à la pointe des pieds. Je fais cul sec, je lâche un lali-ho et je crie tavernier pour la p'tite sœur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_254<tab>Ha! Looks like you finally figured out how to tell a joke! Now's the part where I stare all misty-eyed into the distance, right?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_254<tab>Pwah ah ah ah ah<var 1D /var>! Tu te mets à l'humour<var 1D /var>!? En voilà une bonne nouvelle<var 1D /var>! J'te préviens quand même, mon cœur ne chavire pas aussi facilement que celui de Lamitt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_255<tab>Wha─ Are you sure!? Because I, well... Oh. Ohhh. You're joking, aren't you? For a moment there, I thought, er...never mind.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_255<tab>Glup<var 1D /var>! Quoi<var 1D /var>!? Hein<var 1D /var>!? Comment<var 1D /var>!? Vas-y mollo, j'ai failli croire que t'étais sérieuse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_256<tab>Anyway, there's something I've been wanting to tell you. Firstly, well...you've been following along with my crazy plans this whole time, but I never really said how much I appreciate your help with Sophrosyne─and Lamitt. Thank you.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_256<tab>Ahh... Merci pour tout, au fait. C'est grâce à toi que j'ai pu abatt'e Sophrosyne pour de bon.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_257<tab>And...I think you deserve to know something else, too. You know the elder who exiled Lamitt? That was my great-grandfather.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_257<tab>Et aussi, tu mérites de savoir une chose... Le doyen qui a banni Lamitt... Il s'agit de mon arrière-grand-père.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_258<tab>He's remembered as the greatest warrior of our kind. I always wanted to be just like him. To be strong, honorable, protect our traditions.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_258<tab>Il était considéré comme le plus puissant guerrier nain. J'ai toujours voulu êt'e comme lui, c'était mon modèle...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_259<tab>But Lamitt, she saved so many from their suffering. Us dwarves might not even be here today if she hadn't cured stoneblight...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_259<tab>Lamitt a sauvé ces Nains d'une mort certaine, et peut-être bien tout l'village ainsi que ma lignée... Quand j'ai appris que mon bisaïeul l'avait condamnée à l'exil sans autre forme de procès...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_260<tab>And he took away her home. Forever. It's hard to see that as anything other than cruel.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_260<tab>... Depuis que j'ai quitté Tomra, j'ai fait con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce avec beaucoup de gens de Cristarium, souvent autour d'un godet. Et je t'ai rencontré<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> toi, surtout.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_261<tab>Tradition is important. But it's not the only important thing. Kindness, empathy, love─this world and the living, breathing people in it─they matter more. That's what I learned from all the folks I shared drinks with. From Lamitt. And from you.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_261<tab>Ces expériences m'ont appris une bonne leçon. Les règles sont importantes, mais elles ne sont pas une raison pour oublier l'humain.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_262<tab>And I intend to keep learning. Here, in this city. With my face plain for all to see, and my head held high.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_262<tab>La fière exilée que j'suis va vivre ici un moment.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_263<tab>So you know where to find me, next time you want to share a drink!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_263<tab>Alors passe me voir quand tu veux<var 1D /var>! Surtout si t'as soif<var 1D /var>! On enchaînera cul sec et lali-ho<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_264<tab>I know our job is done. But you'll always have a place at my side, you hear?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_264<tab>Sophrosyne, c'est du passé, mais notre amitié durera pour l'éternité, part'naire<var 1D /var>!
